description: Defender Jake Caprice joins Leyton Orient on a two-year deal after leaving fellow National League club Woking.
title: Jake Caprice: Leyton Orient sign defender on two-year deal
title_page: Jake Caprice: Leyton Orient sign defender on two-year deal - BBC Sport
maintext:
Defender Jake Caprice has joined Leyton Orient on a two-year deal after leaving fellow National League club Woking.
Full-back Caprice, 24, is a former Crystal Palace academy graduate who joined Blackpool in 2012.
His appearances for the Tangerines were limited and he went on to join Lincoln City in 2014 before moving to Woking the following season.
Caprice is the fourth player to join Orient this summer before their campaign in the National League.
